msbt.message: Alright! The week is underway! Gonna get these muscles pumped!
First upâ€”core day! Time to attack that core! Gotta get it good and sore, !
Kicking off the week with a nice, long forearm plank is the way to go, .Getting my muscles trembling feels SUPER good!
Of course, you don't wanna end up so sore that you can't do anything for the rest of the week.Not an issue for me, of course, but you should be careful!
Today I'm gonna attack my upper body. Time to get ripped!
I'm gonna hit the free weights and maybe get some bench time in. Gotta get those biceps burnin'!
When I think upper body, I think abs. My six-pack is already great, but it's time to bump to a ten-pack!
I haven't done a good job keeping my back toned lately, so today's gonna be all pull-ups, !
It's leg day! My favorite day of the week!
Squats are definitely where it's at. Do 'em till your legs are jelly and your glutes are steel, !
Jogging's awesome for getting the leg muscles burning, .Jog a few hundred laps around the island, and I promise that your leg muscles'll be screaming the next day!
I like to lay on my back and lift boulders with my legs. That's nature's leg press, !
Today I'm all about boosting my stamina!
Like, right now I've bumped my walking speed up to a brisk speedwalk, .Eh? Whaddaya mean I'm walking at regular speed? Well, yesterday was leg day, sowhat do you expect?
Now, one of the best ways to boost your stamina is to do more of the stuff you always do, .So I'm gonna do sit-ups, hit some squats, and wrap up with a few hundred push-ups! The usual!
Lately, I've been kinda short of breath for some reason.What? You think I might be exercising TOO much? Ha! You're so funny.
I've been thinking about my diet. If you wanna build muscle, you gotta watch what you eat, !
For high protein and low calories, you really can't beat a good protein shake, .Those're like my bread and butter minus the breadand the butter.
Thing is, every time I start cooking, I start thinking about all the squats I could be doing instead.Plus, protein shakes only take about five minutes to make anyway, .
It's tough to beat high-protein, low- calorie forgurrgle making my stomach growl. Huh.
Finally! The weekend's here! Time to spin up my weekend routine.
If you look super-ultra-mega close, you can see all the progress I've made this week, !
Check out these muscles! Every one of them is unbelievably sore. But I'm not gonna let that stop me!
If you want muscles like these, you can't let up! You gotta keep pushing and get those reps in, !
I was thinking about giving my muscles a rest today, but
Before I realized it, I'd done 200 squats! My body has a brain muscle of its own, !
My body just seems to have a mind of its own! Oh! There it goes again! Guess it's time to work out!
What else would I do? I really need some hobbies,
